column746: Ever watched cosplayers on the BlizzCon stage and thought, \xe2\x80\x9cI want to do that\xe2\x80\x9d? Sounds like you want to cosplay, but have no idea where to start. Here\xe2\x80\x99s your chance to hear from cosplayers who were once exactly where you are. column860: Get ready for an epic finale\xe2\x80\x94Muse is coming to BlizzCon 2017! The Grammy Award\xe2\x80\x93winning band will close out the 11th BlizzCon on Saturday, November 4, delivering a stage-shattering conclusion to the celebration.
